name: django-base-template
description: This is a Django project template
author: Ibraheem Abdul-Malik <ibraheem4@gmail.com>

scripts.lint:pylint: pipenv run pylint --enable=unused-wildcard-import --disable=missing-docstring --disable=django-not-configured --load-plugins pylint_django apps/**/*.py project_name/**/*.py manage.py
scripts.lint:black:fix: pipenv run black manage.py apps/ project_name/
scripts.lint:isort:fix: pipenv run isort --profile black manage.py apps/ project_name/
scripts.load-fixtures: pipenv run python manage.py loaddata project_name_sites users_users socialaccount_socialapp_sites socialaccount_socialapp
